message: This is a fair deal, Bob. You get a small share, but it's better than nothing. Accept this and we can both move on.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the value of the money will decrease in the next round. Let's make this a quick and easy deal.
Bob, I understand your desire for a 60/40 split, but considering the inflation, I believe a 70/30 split is a more equitable solution. Let's end this quickly and move on.
Let's compromise.  I'll take 45, you take 55. This way we both get a decent share before inflation eats away at the value any further.
